docs.snippet: All Times ESTFriday, Feb. 14AUTO RACING5 p.m....
Riding high before his undoing, Raj Rajaratnam asked the rapper Jesse Jaymes to celebrate his hedge fund’s success. The result was “The Good Ship Galleon.”...
docs.abstract: Riding high before his undoing, Raj Rajaratnam asked the rapper Jesse Jaymes to celebrate his hedge fund’s success. The result was “The Good Ship Galleon.”

headline.main: The Making of a Rap Tribute to the Galleon Group

docs.snippet: The United States struggled to explain their latest Olympic speed skating failure on Thursday when top-ranked duo Heather Richardson and Brittany Bowe both missed out on medals in the 1,000 meters....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United States struggled to explain their latest Olympic speed skating failure on Thursday when top-ranked duo Heather Richardson and Brittany Bowe both missed out on medals in the 1,000 meters.

docs.snippet: Utah lawmakers are sending mixed messages to the National Security Agency, which runs a massive data-storage warehouse outside Salt Lake City....
docs.lead_paragraph: Utah lawmakers are sending mixed messages to the National Security Agency, which runs a massive data-storage warehouse outside Salt Lake City.

headline.main: Utah Mulls Measures to Help, Limit NSA Data Center
headline.print_headline: Utah Mulls Measures to Help, Limit NSA Data Center

docs.snippet: Arkansas coach Bret Bielema and Alabama coach Nick Saban voiced their concerns about the effects of up-tempo, no-huddle offenses on player safety to the NCAA committee that passed a proposal to slow down those attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arkansas coach Bret Bielema and Alabama coach Nick Saban voiced their concerns about the effects of up-tempo, no-huddle offenses on player safety to the NCAA committee that passed a proposal to slow down those attacks.

headline.main: Bielema, Saban Supported Slow-Down Rule Proposal
headline.print_headline: Bielema, Saban Supported Slow-Down Rule Proposal

docs.snippet: Veteran Republican U.S. Rep. Doc Hastings, who represented central Washington for two decades and was a key voice in public lands and energy policy, announced Thursday he'll retire at the end of the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Veteran Republican U.S. Rep. Doc Hastings, who represented central Washington for two decades and was a key voice in public lands and energy policy, announced Thursday he'll retire at the end of the year.

headline.main: Veteran Republican US Rep. Doc Hastings to Retire
headline.print_headline: Veteran Republican US Rep. Doc Hastings to Retire

docs.snippet: Comcast Corp's proposed $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc could face close scrutiny from U.S. antitrust regulators because of the deal's potential to reshape the country's pay TV and broadband markets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Comcast Corp's proposed $45.2 billion takeover of Time Warner Cable Inc could face close scrutiny from U.S. antitrust regulators because of the deal's potential to reshape the country's pay TV and broadband markets.

headline.main: Comcast Takeover of Time Warner Cable to Reshape U.S. Pay TV
headline.print_headline: Comcast Takeover of Time Warner Cable to Reshape U.S. Pay TV

docs.snippet: Many Bronx residents and community leaders say that the city has allowed some public walkways to remain covered with snow and ice, making them treacherous for those on foot....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many Bronx residents and community leaders say that the city has allowed some public walkways to remain covered with snow and ice, making them treacherous for those on foot.
docs.abstract: Many Bronx residents and community leaders say New York City has allowed some public walkways, crisscrossing major roads, subway lines, bridges and hilly areas, to remain covered with snow and ice, making them treacherous for those on foot.

headline.main: High-Traffic Walkways in Bronx Become Slippery Obstacles as Snow Lingers
headline.print_headline: High-Traffic Walkways in Bronx Become Slippery Obstacles as Snow Lingers
